rooms.name: Outside Entrance
rooms.description: In front of you there is a large house with no lights on. The windows are boarded up and you can hear squeaking and faint screaming. To the north of you there is an open door covered in blood. The blood of your friend.

rooms.name: Foyer
rooms.description: You have entered the foyer. It is very dark.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: You are now in the library. In front of you is a doll case. Every doll is staring you straight in the eye with a threatening smile. There is one doll that is missing.There is a note attached to the doll case.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: To the right of you is a bookshelf, it is filled with dusty books and cobwebs

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in the kitchen. There is a knife on the counter in front of you. Blood is dripping down onto the floor, slowly.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You have entered the living room. There is a table with nothing but a tablecloth on it. The room is covered with dust and   old fashioned decorations.

rooms.name: Ballroom
rooms.description: You are in the ballroom. On every wall surrounding you there are mirrors and old rustic curtains. In the dark, you see yourself in the mirrors and a faint shadow behind you.

rooms.name: Ballroom
rooms.description: As you move you hear a doll laughing directly behind you

rooms.name: Skeleton Room
rooms.description: You advance up the stairs. As you were walking you heard creaking and cracking. One of the steps fell through, and you fell into a secret room. You landed right in front of a skeleton on the furthest East side of the room.

rooms.name: Stairs of Skeleton Room
rooms.description: You are now facing the painting of an old woman and a cat.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: You have entered a bedroom. In front of you is a piece of paper.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You slowly enter into the dark, creaky bathroom. All you can see is a running sink directly in front of you.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are now facing a toilet.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You walked forward, blindly in the dark, your foot hitting something cold. You figure out that it is a bathtub.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: As you enter this room, a doll awaits to see you, swinging in the antique rocking chair. It says I have your friend. Now MY friends are eating her alive.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: You walk into a third bedroom, with a strange riddle under a painting. Solve the riddle to find the sword, and save your friend.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: You have entered the fourth bedroom, with a doll’s cousin to greet you. Defeat this doll to receive a missing key to save yourself and your friend.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Sitting in front of you is a bed with a key placed neatly on the duvets. This is either really suspicious or you are getting really lucky right now

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: You have collected all the keys to create the master key. The one to open the ancient trap door and open the cellar within the house. Hurry time is running out!

rooms.name: Armory
rooms.description: You enter an armory - you see a pitchfork, a bat, an AK-47, a pistol … and for some strange reason there is a plastic spoon. We have gone very far together my friend, but there is nothing much I can help you do now. Choose carefully, your weapon is your way out.

rooms.name: Cellar
rooms.description: You have now entered a room filled to the brim with dolls. Will you survive? That is for you to decide. Just remember every room has its purpose

rooms.name: Cell
rooms.description: This may be the end of your journey, so play wisely. As you remember the doll has taken your friend and the only way to get them back is by killing the doll
